Question: What type of base do you need for your chesspiece?
Which rod length do you need for your chesspiece?
Which bodytype is the chesspiece?
Constraint/Rule: if (Body.Body_minor) { Base = Base.Base_onestrip } if (Body.Body_minor) { Rod = Rod.Rod_short } if (Body.Body_major) { Base = Base.Base_twostrip } if (Body.Body_major) { Rod = Rod.Rod_long }

Which major chesspiece should be produced?
